theOlympian:RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, TOUCH #b

theOlympian:LightningPower.NAME: Zeus' Lightning
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn for the next #b
turn(s), lightning strikes three random enemies for #b

theOlympian:LightningBoltPower.NAME: Lightning Bolt
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an attack, lightning strikes #b

theOlympian:JoltedPlayerPower.NAME: Jolted
DESCRIPTIONS: The next time you play an Attack, lose #b
HP and all #yJolted will be removed.

theOlympian:JoltedEnemyPower.NAME: Jolted
DESCRIPTIONS: The next time this enemy attacks, it loses #b
HP and all #yJolted will be removed.

theOlympian:LightningRodPower.NAME: Lightning Rod
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you block all damage, add #b

theOlympian:FulminationPower.NAME: Fulmination
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your next turn, add a [#ffe599]Fulmination to your hand.
